pages.title: St. of Hobgoblin Patron
pages.text: $(l:creatures/hobgoblin)Hobgoblins$(/l) can be tricked into directing their worship away from $(l:creatures/mog)Mog$(/l) and $(l:creatures/gulg)Gulg$(/l), their gods. Their worship can be directed to an unscrupulous enough witch instead.

pages.title: Creating the Statue
pages.text: The creation of the statue involves several steps:$(p)$(8)1. Crafting$()$(br)Its creation usually involves $(l:resources/koboldite)Koboldite$(/l).$(p)$(8)2. Binding$()$(br)The statue must be bound to the witch using the appropriate $(l:circle_magic/binding/statue)Rite of Binding$(/l)$(p)$(8)3. Installation$()$(br)The statue must be placed near to Hobgoblins.

pages.title: Effects
pages.text: Having Hobgoblins that worship the statue, will increase the witch's $(l:)Mystic Branch$(/l) powers. The more worshippers, the greater the power directed to the witch.$(p)For a small number of worshippers, the witch's $(l:)infusion$(/l) power will recharge within 64 blocks of the statue.$(br)For a larger number of worshippers, the witch may draw larger versions of a Symbol, and the effect's

powers are amplified.$(p)An even larger number of worshippers allows even larger Symbols to be drawn, further magnifying their effects.$(p)But beware, the more worshippers, the higher the risk of Mog and Gulg taking notice and sending their avatars to sort things out.
